title: Find all DynamoDB that do not have encryption enabled
query:
select
  -- Required Columns
  arn as resource,
  case
    when sse_description is null then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  case
    when sse_description is null then title || ' not encrypted with CMK.'
    else title || ' encrypted with CMK.'
  end as reason,
  -- Additional Dimensions
  region,
  account_id
from
  aws_dynamodb_table
